aod.text: It is recommended to limit outdoor walks, especially for people with respiratory problems. Use protective masks.

uv.text: Avoid direct sunlight. Use sunscreen and wear hats. People with skin problems are advised to stay indoors.

humidity.text: It is advisable to reduce physical activity. People with cardiovascular problems are recommended to stay in cool rooms.

wind.text: People with allergies should limit outdoor activities, as wind increases the concentration of pollen and dust.

temperature.text: Dress warmly, and people with circulation problems should avoid long walks.
Avoid overheating, drink enough water, and people with heart problems should stay indoors in a cool environment.
